(:action read ; Read an item and update its status
  :parameters (?p - person ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?item) (knowledge ?item unread))
  :effect (knowledge ?item read)
)

(:action wash ; Wash an item and update its cleanness
  :parameters (?p - person ?c - clothing ?wm - washing_machine)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?c) (at ?p ?wm) (knowledge ?instructions read) (type ?c gore_tex) (cleanness ?c dirty))
  :effect (cleanness ?c clean)
)

(:action read_and_wash ; Read instructions and wash an item
  :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?c - clothing ?wm - washing_machine)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?item) (knowledge ?item unread) (at ?p ?c) (at ?p ?wm) (type ?c gore_tex) (cleanness ?c dirty))
  :effect (and (knowledge ?item read) (cleanness ?c clean))

(:action wash
  :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?wm - washing_machine)
  :precondition (and
    (at ?p ?item)
    (at ?p ?wm)
    (knowledge instructions read)
    (cleanness ?item dirty)
    (or (type ?item gore_tex)
        (type ?item synthetic)
        (type ?item polar_fleece))
    (or (not (type ?item polar_fleece))
        (and (type ?item polar_fleece)
             (fullness ?wm empty)
             (electric_conductivity ?wm off)))
  )
  :effect (and
    (cleanness ?item clean)
    (when (type ?item polar_fleece)
      (and (fullness ?wm full_with_polar_fleece)
           (electric_conductivity ?wm on))

(:action clean
  :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?location - place ?wm - washing_machine)
  :precondition (and 
    (at ?p ?item)
    (cleanness ?item dirty)
    (or 
      (and (type ?item synthetic) (not (contains ?item polar_fleece)))
      (and (type ?item jacket) (contains ?item down))
      (and (type ?item polar_fleece) (at ?p ?wm) (at ?item ?wm) (knowledge instructions read) (fullness ?wm empty) (electric_conductivity ?wm off))
    )
  )
  :effect (and
    (cleanness ?item clean)
    (when (type ?item polar_fleece) 
      (and (fullness ?wm full_with_polar_fleece) (electric_conductivity ?wm on))
